#summary Documentation for every property that can be set against package data

<wiki:toc max_depth="1" />

= overview =

When processing files in the data/ directory of a package 

== action ==

=== copy ===

Copy the file to the location specified.

=== link ===

Link the file to the location specified.

=== linkr ===

Link the file, overwriting (recursively if its a directory) if it exists, to the location specified. 

=== linko ===

Link the file, overwriting if it exists, to the location specified.

== chmod ==

Set the octal permissions.

== owner ==

Set the owner.

Set the group.
